languages.text: {n}Отчаяние вползает змеей в душу. Они готовились к этому дольше, чем вы. Они почти победили.{/n}
{n}Despair slithers into your soul. They have been preparing for this far longer than you have, and they have almost won.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Отчаяние вползает змеей в душу. Они готовились к этому дольше, чем вы. Они почти победили.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Despair slithers into your soul. They have been preparing for this longer than you did. They have almost won.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La desesperación se infiltra en tu alma. Llevan mucho más tiempo que tú preparándose para esto, y ya casi han ganado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despair slithers into your soul. They have been preparing for this far longer than you have, and they have almost won.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La desesperación se infiltra en tu alma. Llevan mucho más tiempo que tú preparándose para esto, y ya casi han ganado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}絶望が魂に忍び寄る。彼らは、こちらよりもずっと前から、この時のために準備をしていたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despair slithers into your soul. They have been preparing for this far longer than you have, and they have almost won.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}絶望が魂に忍び寄る。彼らは、こちらよりもずっと前から、この時のために準備をしていたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}绝望渗入了你的灵魂之中。他们策划叛乱的时间比你的准备时间长很多，他们几乎已经赢得了这场战斗。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despair slithers into your soul. They have been preparing for this far longer than you have, and they have almost won.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}绝望渗入了你的灵魂之中。他们策划叛乱的时间比你的准备时间长很多，他们几乎已经赢得了这场战斗。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Verzweiflung kriecht in deine Seele. Sie haben sich schon sehr viel länger hierauf vorbereitet als du, und sie haben schon fast gewonnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despair slithers into your soul. They have been preparing for this far longer than you have, and they have almost won.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Verzweiflung kriecht in deine Seele. Sie haben sich schon sehr viel länger hierauf vorbereitet als du, und sie haben schon fast gewonnen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre âme est soudain envahie par le désespoir. Ils se préparent à cet événement depuis bien plus longtemps que vous, et pour eux, la victoire est proche.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despair slithers into your soul. They have been preparing for this far longer than you have, and they have almost won.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre âme est soudain envahie par le désespoir. Ils se préparent à cet événement depuis bien plus longtemps que vous, et pour eux, la victoire est proche.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Umutsuzluk ruhuna işliyor. Olacaklara senden çok daha uzun zamandır hazırlanıyorlardı, kazanmaya çok yakınlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Despair slithers into your soul. They have been preparing for this far longer than you have, and they have almost won.{/n}
